timeline.message:
Add Alluxio based data caching

This change enables Alluxio client-side local data cache on the worker.
This change also does a bit of refactoring of caching related pieces.
To enable Alluxio local cache, use following configuration
cache.enabled=true
cache.type=ALLUXIO
Collaborated with @haoyuan and @bf8086

timeline.bodyText:
nit: how about using switch statement? We should handle different cacheType explicitly otherwise it would be error-prone when adding new cacheType.
switch (cacheType) {
  case ALLUXIO:
    ...
  case FILE_MERGE:
    ...
  default:
    throw
}
timeline.author: shixuan-fan

timeline.bodyText: nit: maybe put them into one line? If the line is too long, we could put one argument per line.
timeline.author: shixuan-fan

timeline.bodyText:
Yep, this is one of the most important lines in this PR. Let's make a comment on this. Something like
piggyback hiveFileContext payload through uriStatus
hiveFileContext is critical to openFile interface that cannot be ignored
